text:
I downloaded apache-lenya-1.2.3-bin.tar.gz. But, in Japanese environment, i18ned
messages are displayed as garbage. So, I think Japanese user cannot use lenya..
I checked lenya/src/webapp/lenya/resources/i18n/cmsui_ja.xml file, but it seems
to be broken.
creator: shinsuke@yahoo.co.jp
gregor@apache.org
text:
i'd like to fix that, but have no way of ensuring it works. it seems to me the
encoding of the translations file got corrupted. can you check the original file
at http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33121 and let me know what
needs to be done?

creator: shinsuke@yahoo.co.jp
text:
Created attachment 15119
packed cmsui_ja.xml of Bug 33121

I checked the attachment of Bug 33121. It is correct. I attached cmsui_ja.xml
packed by zip. could you use it? I'll double-check it after it is integrated
into svn.

i checked it in again, seems to be ok now:

http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/*checkout*/lenya/trunk/src/webapp/lenya/resources/i18n/cmsui_ja.xml?rev=178742&content-type=application/xml
creator: gregor@apache.org
